title: Erin McKean
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body"><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="480" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/meErFXm1-3Q?rel=0&controls=0" width="853"></iframe>  
Lexicographer, blogger, and self-described “word nerd” Erin McKean and Art Institute curator Elizabeth Siegel discuss how language changed during the twentieth century and how words continue to evolve today.</section><section id="figures"> Click here to watch the video. </section>
